info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 6:13PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A NARROW BAND OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF HAMILTON...NORTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEAST WARREN...NORTHERN WARREN...AND NORTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of embedded heavy snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 mph which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 610 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was 8 miles east of Moffitt Beach Campground, or 9 miles southeast of Speculator moving east at 40 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL BE NEAR... Lake Luzerne Campground and Lake Luzerne-Hadley around 645 PM EST. Lake George Village around 650 PM EST. Glens Falls North and West Glens Falls around 655 PM EST. Glens Falls, Hudson Falls and Fort Edward around 700 PM EST. Hartford around 715 PM EST. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 17S and 23. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
